ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster

Class HostManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.supertomcat.bh.hoster.HostManager

  • public class HostManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which holds the host-classes and provides methods to check and parse the URLs There is also a method which removes duplicates from an URL-Array

      • checkURL

        public java.util.List<URL> checkURL(URL urlObject,
                           ch.supertomcat.settingstools.options.OptionBoolean bOK,
                           ch.supertomcat.guitools.progressmonitor.ProgressObserver progress)
        Check if a hostclass accepts the url and return a nice filename for the url. If there is no hostclass available which would accept the url then null is returned
        Parameters:
        urlObject - URL-Object
        bOK - Flag if there is a Hoster for this url
        progress - ProgessObserver
        Returns:
        Array of URL-Objects or null
